column1: Jawad is a District and a Nagar Panchayat in Neemuch district in the Indian state of Madhya Pradesh.There are six towns and 105 villages in Jawad.

column3: 129. Males constitute 51% of the population and females 49%. Jawad has an average literacy rate of 70%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 80%
column5: and female literacy is 59%. In Jawad
column6: 11.5% of the population is under 6 years of age.
